column4: personally, I keep gnome installed but create my own desktop session for GDM. Alternately, there's always arch linux... they love this kind of thing.
yea, ive thought about going back to arch, i've thought about going back to gentoo, but i think ill end up back with a vanilla debian install
the only reaons I'm not on debian is the ppa's...
yea...that has alot to do with why im using a custom ubuntu install too
